name: Goristro
lore: Goristros are massive, bull-headed demons that serve as living siege engines in the Abyss. Among the most destructive of demonkind, they combine brute strength with a supernatural ability to navigate any labyrinth. Demon lords use goristros to topple the fortresses of their rivals and to trample opposing armies. Despite their fearsome might, goristros are dim-witted and easily directed by more cunning fiends.

traits.name: Labyrinthine Recall
traits.description: The goristro can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The goristro has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.description: The goristro deals double damage to objects and structures.

multiattack.description: The goristro makes one Gore attack and two Slam attacks.

actions.name: Gore
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +13, reach 10 ft. Hit: 38 (7d8 + 7) Piercing damage. If the goristro moved at least 10 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 22 (4d10) Piercing damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 21 Strength saving throw or have the Prone condition.

damage.notes: if the goristro moved at least 10 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit

savingThrow.targets: the target, if the goristro moved at least 10 feet straight toward it

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +13, reach 10 ft. Hit: 25 (4d8 + 7) Bludgeoning damage.

bonusActions.name: Charge
bonusActions.description: The goristro moves up to its Speed in a straight line without provoking Opportunity Attacks.
